p: Among phenolics, naringin was reported to possess antitumor properties and to inhibit the growth of gastric cancer cells through the induction of autophagy [ 68]. The anti-proliferative and pro-apoptotic activity of naringenin is also well documented [ 69, 70]. This evidence suggests that several phytoconstituents can represent the possible bioactive agents of hemp EO, although the role of unique interactions of all the compounds in the phytocomplex cannot be excluded.
